body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Prussia. Married to Roseanna Kling Bloom in January 1851. Father of Ellen Bloom, Levi Bloom, Jacob Bloom, Isadore Bloom, Max Bloom, and Milton Bloom. Dry goods merchant in Louisville in 1858. Merchant in Louisville in 1860. Partner with Emanuel Bamberger and William H. Moore in E. Bamberger & Company dry goods merchants in Louisville in 1861. Merchant in Jefferson County in 1863. Partner with Emanuel Bamberger and Levi Bamberger in Bamberger, Bloom, & Company dry goods wholesale merchants in Louisville in 1865.
